greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Irregular triangle read by rows: T(n,k) = number of trees on n nodes with radius k, n>=1, 1 <= k <= floor(n/2).
comment: The radius of a tree is the maximal distance of a node from the center.
link: Peter Steinbach, Field Guide to Simple Graphs, Volume 3, Part 8 (For Volumes 1, 2, 3, 4 of this book see A000088, A008406, A000055, A000664, respectively.)
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Mar 19 2017
